AT.name: Mega Man™ 2
AT.description: Mega Man 2 wird als eines der besten Action-Spiele aller Zeiten angesehen. Es weist einige Verbesserungen im Vergleich zu seinem bereits grandiosen Vorgänger auf. Mit noch mehr Stages und Superrobotern lässt der schiere Umfang des Spiels Zockerherzen schneller schlagen. Wir schreiben das Jahr 200X. Dr. Lights Superroboter Mega Man ist es gelungen, den ruchlosen Dr. Wily zu besiegen, und es herrscht Frieden auf dem Planeten. Dr. Wily kehrt jedoch mit einer neuen Armee aus Superrobotern zurück, um unseren Helden herauszufordern. Kann Mega Man die Welt erneut retten? Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mega Man™ 2
AU.description: Regarded as one of the greatest action games of all time, Mega Man 2 improves upon its already superb predecessor. With even more stages and Robot Masters, its sheer size and scope are enough to get gamers' hearts palpitating. The year is 200X. Dr. Light’s super-robot, Mega Man, has succeeded in defeating the nefarious Dr. Wily and peace reigns over the planet. However, Dr. Wily returns with a new army of Robot Masters to challenge our hero. Can Mega Man save the world again? If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mega Man™ 2
BG.description: Regarded as one of the greatest action games of all time, Mega Man 2 improves upon its already superb predecessor. With even more stages and Robot Masters, its sheer size and scope are enough to get gamers' hearts palpitating. The year is 200X. Dr. Light’s super-robot, Mega Man, has succeeded in defeating the nefarious Dr. Wily and peace reigns over the planet. However, Dr. Wily returns with a new army of Robot Masters to challenge our hero. Can Mega Man save the world again? If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mega Man™ 2
BE.description: Considéré comme l'un des meilleurs jeux d'action de tous les temps, Mega Man 2, est encore plus abouti que son célèbre prédécesseur. Découvrez encore plus de niveaux et d'ennemis retors dans ce volet dont la durée de vie et le niveau de difficulté vous tiendront en haleine. Année 200X. Mega Man, le super robot du Dr. Light, a terrassé l'infâme Dr. Wily et la paix du monde est enfin restaurée. Cependant, le Dr. Wily n'a pas dit son dernier mot et revient accompagné d'une armée de robots malfaisants pour se venger de notre héros. Mega Man pourra-t-il à nouveau sauver le monde ? Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Mega Man™ 2
ES.description: Considerado como uno de los mejores juegos de acción de todos los tiempos, Mega Man 2 supera incluso a su magnífico predecesor. Con más niveles y más robots jefe, su magnitud y posibilidades harán vibrar al jugador. Año 200X. El superrobot del Dr. Light, Mega Man, ha derrotado al malvado Dr. Wily, y la paz ha vuelto a reinar en el planeta. Sin embargo, el Dr. Wily vuelve con un nuevo ejército de robots jefe con el propósito de desafiar a nuestro héroe. ¿Podrá Mega Man salvar el mundo otra vez? Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Mega Man™ 2
IT.description: Considerato uno dei migliori giochi d'azione di tutti i tempi, Mega Man 2 presenta caratteristiche ancora più entusiasmanti rispetto a quelle del suo predecessore. Grazie a un numero maggiore di boss e aree da esplorare, adrenalina e batticuore sono assicurati! Anno 200X: Mega Man, il super robot creato dal Dr. Light, è riuscito a sconfiggere il malvagio Dr. Wily e sul pianeta regna ora la pace. Tuttavia, il folle scienziato torna sulla scena con una nuova armata di robot per sfidare il nostro eroe. Riuscirà Mega Man a salvare il mondo ancora una volta? Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Mega Man™ 2
NL.description: Mega Man 2 dat wordt gezien als een van de beste actiespellen ooit, bouwt voort op zijn uitmuntende voorganger. Met nog meer gebieden en robotbazen laat louter de omvang en reikwijdte een spelershart al sneller kloppen. Het is het jaar 200X. Mega Man, de superrobot van Dr. Light, heeft de snode Dr. Wily succesvol verslagen en vrede heerst op de planeet. Dr. Wily keert echter terug met een nieuw leger van robotbazen om onze held uit te dagen. Kan Mega Man de wereld opnieuw redden? Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mega Man™ 2
NZ.description: Regarded as one of the greatest action games of all time, Mega Man 2 improves upon its already superb predecessor. With even more stages and Robot Masters, its sheer size and scope are enough to get gamers' hearts palpitating. The year is 200X. Dr. Light’s super-robot, Mega Man, has succeeded in defeating the nefarious Dr. Wily and peace reigns over the planet. PL.name: Mega Man™ 2
PL.description: Regarded as one of the greatest action games of all time, Mega Man 2 improves upon its already superb predecessor. With even more stages and Robot Masters, its sheer size and scope are enough to get gamers' hearts palpitating. The year is 200X. Dr. Light’s super-robot, Mega Man, has succeeded in defeating the nefarious Dr. Wily and peace reigns over the planet. However, Dr. Wily returns with a new army of Robot Masters to challenge our hero. Can Mega Man save the world again? If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mega Man™ 2
PT.description: Considerado um dos melhores jogos de ação de todos os tempos, Mega Man 2 apresenta melhorias em relação ao seu já magnífico predecessor. Com ainda mais níveis e Robot Masters, a sua dimensão e esfera de ação totais são suficientes para fazer palpitar o coração dos jogadores. Estamos no ano 200X. Mega Man, o super robô do Dr. Light, derrotou o malvado Dr. Wily e a paz reina no planeta. No entanto, o Dr. Wily regressa com um exército de Robot Masters para desafiar o nosso herói. Conseguirá Mega Man salvar o mundo novamente? Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mega Man™ 2
RU.description: Mega Man 2 превзошел по популярности первую игру серии и заслужил титул одного из лучших экшенов всех времен! В нем еще больше уровней и злобных Robot Masters; невероятные масштабы игры заставляют сердца игроков трепетать от восторга. 200Х-й год. Созданный гениальным Dr. Light суперробот Mega Man победил коварного Dr. Wily, и на планете царит мир. Но враг намерен отомстить: он снова собрал армию Robot Masters и бросил вызов нашему герою. Сможет ли Mega Man спасти планету на этот раз? Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
